title: Salt River Bay National Historical Park and Ecological Preserve: Things to Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do             Things To Do       Salt River Bay offers visitors a variety of ways to explore the area. Ask your lodging hosts for information about guided land tours. Scuba diving, snorkeling, kayaking, and hiking tours can be arranged too. You may want to contact the Virgin Islands Department of Tourism at 340-773-0495 or St. Croix Chamber of Commerce at 340-733-1435 for more information.
